mapper.insert: insert into student (name, username, password, avatar, sex, code, role,college_id,score) values (#{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{avatar}, #{sex}, #{code}, #{role},#{collegeId},#{score})
mapper.update: update student set name=#{name}, username=#{username}, password=#{password}, avatar=#{avatar}, sex=#{sex}, code=#{code}, role=#{role}, college_id=#{collegeId}, score=#{score} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select student.*,college.name as collegeName from student left join college on college.id=student.college_id
and name like concat ('%',#{name},'%')
order by student.id desc
